channel.title: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra
channel.description:
This series presents performances by the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra from its 1963 season.

An online collection of early educational public radio content from the National Association of Educational Broadcasters (NAEB).

item.title: Beethoven, part 4
item.description: This program, the fourth of four parts, features the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra joined by pianist Claudio Arrau; and the College-Conservatory Chorus of the University of Cincinnati. Selections composed by Beethoven are performed.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Bach, Bartok, and Brahms, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of five parts, features the University of Cincinnati College-Conservatory Chorus performing with the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra. Selections by Bach, Bartok, and Brahms are performed.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Bach, Bartok, and Brahms, part 5
item.description: This program, the fifth of five parts, features the University of Cincinnati College- Conservatory Chorus performing with the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra. Selections by Bach, Bartok, and Brahms are performed.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Mendelssohn, Strauss, and Sibelius, part 1
item.description: This program, the first of five parts, features performances of pieces by Mendelssohn, Strauss and Sibelius. Featuring Edith Peinemann, violin; and Erich Kunzel, conductor.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Beethoven, part 2
item.description: This program, the second of four parts, features the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra joined by pianist Claudio Arrau; and the College-Conservatory Chorus of the University of Cincinnati. Selections composed by Beethoven are performed.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Beethoven, part 3
item.description: This program, the third of four parts, features the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra joined by pianist Claudio Arrau; and the College-Conservatory Chorus of the University of Cincinnati. Selections composed by Beethoven are performed.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Mendelssohn, Strauss, and Sibelius, part 3
item.description: Mendelssohn, Strauss and Sibelius. Featuring Edith Peinemann, violin; Erich Kunzel, conductor.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Stravinsky
item.description: This program features a performance of Igor Stravinsky's "Rites Of Spring."
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch, part 4
item.description: This program, part four of four, features performances of compositions from Papaioannou, Prokofieff, Busoni, and Bruch. Violinist Isaac Stern is the featured guest.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Symphonic concert
item.description: The program presents the performance of an unidentified piece by the Cincinnati Symphony.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Bach, Bartok, and Brahms, part 3
item.description: This program, the first of five parts, features performances of pieces by Bach, Bartok, and Brahms. Pianist Sidney Foster is the guest performer.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Weber, Takacs, and Berlioz
item.description: This program features performances of pieces by Carl Maria von Weber, Jeno Takacs, and Hector Berlioz.

item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Mozart
item.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Mozart.

item.title: Audition tape
item.description: Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra audition tape, recorded at 1963 rehearsal with permission of Musicians' Association, not for broadcast. This program contains portions of Kodaly Symphony and last movement of Beethoven Concerto No. 1.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Donizetti and Ravel
item.description: Roberta Peters performs a piece by Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Ravel.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti
item.description: Roberta Peters performs pieces by Mozart, Verdi and Donizetti. The Cincinatti Symphony Orchestra performs a piece by Delius.
item.dc:creator: University of Cincinnati
item.dc:subject: Symphonies (Band)

item.title: Mozart, Delius, Verdi, and Donizetti

item.title: Bartok's Piano Concerto, No. 3
item.description: A performance by pianist Peter Serkin and conductor Max Rudolf, along with the Cincinnati Symphony Orchestra, of Bela Bartok's Piano Concerto, No. 3.
